CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. A21, reads: "Poise and Charm - These pretty young ladies were also guests at the AKA tea last Sunday at the Alpha House. Left to right: Carol Jones, "Betsy" Johnson, Andrea Shepherd and Marva Jo Hord. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women wearing hats, including Carol Jones, "Betsy" Johnson, Andrea Shepherd, and Marva Jo Hord, posed on stairs at Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity house
